name: Dialog eSMS
author: Adeona Technologies

sections.description:
Corporate SMS solution

  • e-SMS is a revolutionary solution by Dialog Axiata PLC which will enable you to send an SMS to multiple parties in an easy-to-use interface at a very nominal cost without any initial setup costs in real-time.

Bulk messaging

  • e-SMS is a revolutionary solution by Dialog Axiata PLC which will enable you to send an SMS to multiple parties in an easy-to-use interface at a very nominal cost without any initial setup costs in real-time

Dialog e-SMS

  • The Dialog e-SMS solution platform facilitates enterprises in dispatching SMSs to their customers via a mobile application or a WEB portal.

Features

  • SMSs will be delivered to the customers under a User ID (Masking ) instead of the mobile number
  • Can send a BULK SMS (thousands of number of SMSs) in a single click
  • Number file can be uploaded on an excel file
  • Obtain delivery reports
  • Create/Schedule SMS campaigns
  • Supports long messages
  • Supports messaging in multiple languages
  • Portal is available on both web and mobile application
  • Support as a communication channel.
  • Connectivity: 24×7 service from any location.
  • Confidentiality and security.
  • Simple & user-friendly.

Restrictions and Limitations

  • If the alphanumeric origination number is used, then the max length of the address (Masking )should not exceed 11 characters (including spaces).
  • For Marketing / Promotional messages will be blocked from 8pm to 8am as regulated by TRCSL
  • The mask should be relevant & owned by the company
  • Maximum of 5 masks can be allowed to a company

Installation and Use

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the plugin files to the directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  • You can receive the Digital Bill to your Mobile Phone after Making the Payment.

It’s not working

  • Step 1. Check if Woocommerce Plugin is activated.
  • Step 2. Check if e-SMS Plugin is activated.
  • Step 3. Deactivate all plugins and reactivate e-SMS Plugin.
